helpSummary: Can't find the producer or compliance scheme?
insufficientBalanceError: The tonnage you entered exceeds your available waste balance

issued.wasteBalanceMessage: Your waste balance has been updated.

issuedToLabel: Packaging waste producer or compliance scheme

list.noPrns: No PRNs or PERNs have been created yet.

perns.balanceHint: This is the balance available for creating PERNs
perns.cancelHint: If you cancel a PERN, its tonnage will be added to your available waste balance.
perns.noIssuedPrns: No PERNs have been issued yet.

prns.balanceHint: This is the balance available for creating PRNs
prns.cancelHint: If you cancel a PRN, its tonnage will be added to your available waste balance.
prns.noIssuedPrns: No PRNs have been issued yet.

perns.caption: Create PERN
perns.checkIntroText: Check the following information is correct before creating this PERN.
perns.checkAuthorisationText: When created, the PERN will need to be authorised and issued by a PERN signatory from your company.
perns.checkInsetText: Any information that is not shown here will be automatically populated when the PERN is issued.
perns.helpText: PERNs can only be issued to packaging waste producers and compliance schemes who have registered with regulators. If the buyer you're looking for is not appearing, check that you have spelled the name correctly and that they are registered with a regulator.
perns.notesHint: These notes will appear on the PERN
perns.recipientLabel: Enter who this PERN will be issued to
perns.successNextStepsText: Your PERN has been created as a draft. You can view and manage it from your registration dashboard.

prns.caption: Create PRN
prns.checkIntroText: Check the following information is correct before creating this PRN.
prns.checkAuthorisationText: When created, the PRN will need to be authorised and issued by a PRN signatory from your company.
prns.checkInsetText: Any information that is not shown here will be automatically populated when the PRN is issued.
prns.helpText: PRNs can only be issued to packaging waste producers and compliance schemes who have registered with regulators. If the buyer you're looking for is not appearing, check that you have spelled the name correctly and that they are registered with a regulator.
prns.notesHint: These notes will appear on the PRN
prns.recipientLabel: Enter who this PRN will be issued to
prns.successNextStepsText: Your PRN has been created as a draft. You can view and manage it from your registration dashboard.

recipientHint: Start typing the name of the packaging waste producer or compliance scheme
tonnageHint: Enter a whole number without decimal places

prns.heading: Packaging recycling note
prns.complianceYearText: This PRN relates to waste accepted for reprocessing in {{year}} and can count towards {{year}} obligations.

perns.heading: Packaging export recycling note
perns.complianceYearText: This PERN relates to waste accepted for export in {{year}} and can count towards {{year}} obligations.
